mutants.code:
def convert_string(text):
    text = text.lower()
    vowels = ['', 'e', 'i', 'o', 'u']
    text = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    text = text[::-1]
    return text

def convert_string(text):
    text = text.lower()
    vowels = ['a', '', 'i', 'o', 'u']
    text = ''.join([char for char in text if char not in vowels])
    text = text[::-1]
    return text

    text = text.lower()
